# Other important verbs:

Verbs that are absolutely essential to Spanish conversation but not included here are:

| Spanish Verb   | English Meaning               |
|:---------------|:------------------------------|
| pedir          | to ask for/order              |
| cambiar        | to change                     |
| buscar         | to search/look for            |
| dormir         | to sleep                      |
| jugar          | to play (a game or sport)     |
| intentar       | to try                        |
| empezar        | to begin                      |
| recordar       | to remember                   |
| olvidar        | to forget                     |
| tocar          | to touch/play (an instrument) |
| decidir        | to decide                     |
| mostrar        | to show                       |
| correr         | to run                        |
| probar         | to try/test                   |
| desear         | to wish/desire                |
| recibir        | to receive                    |
| bailar         | to dance                      |
| repetir        | to repeat                     |
| enviar         | to send                       |
| vender         | to sell                       |
| resolver       | to solve                      |
| coger          | to take (in Spain)            |
| romper         | to break                      |
| girar          | to turn                       |
| morir          | to die                        |
| nacer          | to be born                    |
